description: A topping of salted caramel sauce and crunchy chocolate pretzels take this homemade vanilla ice cream to another level.
name: Caramel & Chocolate Crunch Sundae Recipe | Woolworths

recipeInstructions.text: To serve, roughly crush some chocolate-covered pretzels in a plastic food bag and scatter over the ice cream. Finish with a drizzle of the salted caramel sauce.
